EmailTemplate.description: Template to send SLA notification to the ‘Supervisor / Manager’ when a ‘Case’ has remained in ‘Open’ state (not ‘In-Queue or ‘Closed’) for more than 14 days (343 hours)
EmailTemplate.name: ZZ_SBU Internal SLA 14 Days Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.SLA_Category__c} Case# {!Case.CaseNumber} is aged '14 Days' and is not 'Closed'
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.SLA_Category__c} team supervisor ,
Case#{!Case.CaseNumber} has been in assigned state for ‘14 Days’ and has not been closed.
Please review the case.
Detail Case Link : {!Case.Link}
Thank You,
SFDC Team
SFDCSupport@carefirst.com
